name: Phusicos VR
summary: PHUSICOS-VR takes you to sites around Europe where various nature-based solutions can be used to mitigate natural hazards, including floods, agricultural run-off, rock falls and avalanches. Nature-based solutions are sustainable, green solutions which increase safety while also promoting biodiversity and provide other co-benefits compared to more traditional civil engineering measures. This is becoming increasingly important in a climate adaptation perspective.
